thread.title: May, Macron face lawmakers over Syria

title: May, Macron face lawmakers over Syria
text:
May, Macron face lawmakers over Syria 4:35am EDT - 01:35 
British Prime Minister Theresa May is set to appear before MPs to defend her decision to join airstrikes against Syria without parliamentary consent. French President Emmanuel Macron is also billed to address lawmakers after committing to the military action.   
British Prime Minister Theresa May is set to appear before MPs to defend her decision to join airstrikes against Syria without parliamentary consent. French President Emmanuel Macron is also billed to address lawmakers after committing to the military action.  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/04/16/may-macron-face-lawmakers-over-syria?videoId=418272379&videoChannel=13421
